abstract.t: This document describes extensions to the Bidirectional ForwardingDetection (BFD) protocol for its use in multipoint and multicastnetworks. Comments on this draft should be directed to rtg-bfd@ietf.org.Conventions used in this documentThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC-2119 [KEYWORDS].
